_header: Who that seeth Him on the Rood
Subjects: Passion, meditations on; Christ, passion of
_description: A meditation on the Passion — nine lines

BLHar7322.Transcription:
Ho þat siþ him one þe Rodeiesus his lemmonAnd his
                    moder bi him stondeSore wepinde and seynt iohanAnd his syden istonge
                    soreffor þe loue of þe manWel shulde he his sunne
                    forsakeWete teres and eke letenÞat of loue cristen
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
